description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Don't run with scissors! But if you do, be careful and press all the right buttons at the right time. Because if you don't...well just hope that you do.
description.short: Don't run with scissors! But if you do, be careful and press all the right buttons at the right time. Because if you don't...well just hope that you do.
